body_html:
@meteorcloudy Sorry, I just got back from the Thanksgiving holiday. I have fixed the nvcc.exe issue. I am a bit unclear on the .dll issue. Where are the build rules that reference the .dlls?

If that issue is not blocking this PR, I'm fine with merging this change and you can send a separate PR for that issue since I do not currently have access to a Windows machine that I can test that on.

body:
@meteorcloudy Sorry, I just got back from the Thanksgiving holiday. I have fixed the `nvcc.exe` issue. I am a bit unclear on the `.dll` issue. Where are the build rules that reference the `.dll`s?

If that issue is not blocking this PR, I'm fine with merging this change and you can send a separate PR for that issue since I do not currently have access to a Windows machine that I can test that on.
